property.name: Text
property.value: α: –X. X is your location's column number. β: –1. Place 1 resource on this card, as a scrap. γ: –2. If you fail, remove 1 scrap from this card. δ: –3. If you fail, take 1 damage. — Scraps

property.name: Text
property.value: α: –X. X is twice your location's column number. β: –3. If you succeed, place 1 resource on this card, as a scrap. γ: –4. Remove 1 scrap from this card. δ: –5. Take 1 damage. — Switches

property.name: Text
property.value: α: –X. X is twice your location's column number. β: –3. If you succeed, place 1 resource on this card, as a switch. γ: –4. Move the Mine Cart once. δ: –5. Remove 1 switch from this card. — Switches

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced – When this agenda advances: Move all doom on it to the next agenda.

property.name: Text
property.value: Deal 2 damage to each investigator and 1 direct damage to each Ally asset they control. Reveal the Control Station location and move each surviving investigator to it. Each investigator loses all of their clues. Advance the act.

property.name: Text
property.value: Locations with a story asset on them cannot be slid or swapped. Each enemy gains the hunter keyword and resolves its hunter keyword an additional time during the enemy phase. When an enemy moves, each adjacent location is considered to be connected to its location.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each surviving investigator is defeated and suffers 1 physical or 1 mental trauma.

property.name: Text
property.value: Objective – At the end of the round, if each surviving investigator is at Control Station, advance. (Hint: Get to the Control Station before the agenda advances!)

property.name: Text
property.value: Remove each Cave location from the game (discarding all enemies, tokens, and attachments at those locations). If River Hawthorne is in play but not under control of any investigator, remove them from the game. Each investigator loses all but 2 of their clues. If it is agenda 1a, advance the agenda directly to agenda 2a (do not resolve agenda 1b). Your search for supplies will help you navigate whatever is ahead. Flip the scenario reference card over to its other side, moving all scraps on it to that side, as switches. Read Scenario Interlude: The Cave-In (page 10).

property.name: Text
property.value: θ During your turn, spend 1π clues, as a group: Either slide a location into an empty adjacent space, or swap 2 adjacent locations. η Spend 1π resources: Slide a revealed location into an empty adjacent space. (Group limit once per round.) η If the Prismatic Shard story asset is at your location: Take control of it. Objective – Get to the Rail Exit! When the Mine Cart enters Rail Exit, immediately advance.

property.name: Text
property.value: Check the following: — If an investigator controls Simeon Atwood, (->R1). — If an investigator controls Leah Atwood, (->R2). — If Simeon Atwood is set aside or still in play and not under the control of an investigator, (->R3). — If Leah Atwood is set aside or still in play and not under the control of an investigator, (->R4). — If none of the above is true, (->R5).

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced – At the end of the enemy phase: Move Mine Cart once. If it moves off the rail line, each investigator is defeated and suffers 1 physical trauma. ι When Mine Cart moves, spend 1 switch: Either cancel the move, or move an additional time. (Group limit twice per phase.) Rail: Right

property.name: Text
property.value: As an additional cost to enter Control Station, investigators at an adjacent location must spend 2π clues, as a group. Rail: Up, Right

property.name: Text
property.value: θ During your turn: Swap 2 adjacent Rail locations. (Group limit once per game.) Rail: Up, Right

property.name: Text
property.value: Hunter. Massive. Subterranean Beast gets +3π health. If Subterranean Beast is ready and at the Mine Cart's location, the Mine Cart cannot move. η Send 1π clues: Exhaust Subterranean Beast. It cannot ready this round. Victory 2.

property.name: Text
property.value: Hunter. Forced – After Burrowing Hybrid enters play, if the Mine Cart is facing a connecting location: Slide that location into an adjacent empty palce. If you cannot, swap it with a location adjacent to it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Hunter. X is Frienzied Miner's column number. Forced – After Frienzied Miner attacks you: Deal 1 damage to each other investigator and Resident asset at this location.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation – Attach Cave-In to the location the Mine Cart is facing. If you cannot, Cave-In gains surge. Forced – When the Mine Cart would move into attached location: Cancel the move and deal 2 damage to each investigator and Resident asset in the Mine Cart. η: Test ή or ί (2). If you succeed, discard Cave-In. An investigator at an adjacent location may trigger this ability.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation – Test ί (5). If you fail, put Wild Ride into play in your threat area. Forced – When the Mine Cart moves: Either move it 2 additional times, or deal 1 direct damage and 1 direct horror to each investigator, Ally asset, and Resident card they control. Discard Wild Ride.

property.name: Text
property.value: Uses (4 brilliance). ι When a scenario card effect would discard any number of cards from your hand, exhaust Prismatic Shard and spend 1 brilliance: Ignore that effect and draw that many cards, instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: α: –X. X is your curent floor number (to a minimum of 1). β: –1. If your location is an enemy, exhaust it. γ: –3. If you fail, heal 1 damage from the nearest enemy-location. δ: –4. If you fail and it is agenda 2a or 3a, after this test resolves, remove this token from the chaos bag and add it to the predation bag.

property.name: Text
property.value: α: –X. X is twice your curent floor number (to a minimum of 2). β: –2. If you succeed and your location is an enemy, exhaust it. γ: –4. If you fail, heal 1π damage from the nearest enemy-location. δ: –5. If it is agenda 2a or 3a, after this test resolves, remove this token from the chaos bag and add it to the predation bag.

property.name: Text
property.value: Create a separate bag consisting of the following tokens: β, γ, and δ. (If you do not have a second bag, you can use a cup, bowl, or other opaque container.) This is the predation bag, and these are predation tokens. They are not chaos tokens. Then, add the following tokens to the predation bag based on the current day: — Day 1: Add β, β to the predation bag. — Day 2: Add β to the predation bag. — Day 3: No changes is made. Some abilities will instruct investigators to make a predation test. A predation test may caus the house to come alive and prey on the investigators. To resolve a predation test, reveal a random token from the predation bag and resolve the effects for that token as indicated on the other side of this card. Flip this card over and place it next to the scenario reference card.

property.name: Text
property.value: β: –2. Set this token aside. γ: Each enemy location attacks each investigator at that location. If no attack was made by this effect, the lead investigator draws the top card of the encounter deck. Return this token and each set-aside token to the predation bag. δ: set this token aside. Find the unsealed, Dormant location nearest to the lead investigator. Flip that location to its enemy-location side.

property.name: Text
property.value: Shuffle each copy of the set-aside Out of the Walls and Pulled In treacheries into the encounter deck, along with the encounter discount pile. Find the unsealed Dormant location nearest to the most investigators. Flip that location to its enemy-location side. Find the set-aside the Predatory House story card and resolve its text.

Objective – At the end of the round, if a total of 7 locations are sealed and/or in the victory display, advance.

property.name: Text
property.value: If there are more seals in play than enemy-locations in the victory display: Put the set-aside Shapeless Cellar enemy-location into play on the Cellar Floor, as close to the advanced to themiddle column as possible. Advance to the set-aside act 2a "The Heart of the House" and remove act 2a "Against the House" from the game. ___ If there are more enemy-locations in the victory display play than seals in play: Advance to the set-aside act 2a "Against the House" and remove act 2a "The Heart of the House" from the game.

property.name: Text

property.name: Text
property.value: Randomly put the three set-aside locations from the Horrors in the Rock encounter set into play, unrevealed, adjacent to the three starting locations as explained on page 20 of the Campaign Guide. Take the remaining set aside locations (Salt Chamber, Larval Tunnel, and Crystal Nursery) along with the top 3 cards of the encounter deck. Shuffle them together and randomly deal 1 card facedown beneath each location.

property.name: Text
property.value: η If there are no clues on your location: Draw the top card beneath your location. θ Investigators at your location spend 1π clues, as a group: Look at the top card beneath your location. You may place that card on the bottom of its stack. Objective – If each undefeated investigator has resigned and there are 1 or more Crystal Remains in the victory displays, advance.

property.name: Text
property.value: Check the number of Crystal Remains in the victory display. — If there are exactly 3 Crystal Remains, (->R1) (page 22). — Otherwise, (->R2) (page22).

property.value: η Investigators at Crystal Grove spend 1π clues, as a group: Add a Crystal Remains you control to the victory display.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation – Put Larval Tunnel into play adjacent to the location from which it was drawn. Search the encounter deck and discard pile for a Colorless Larva and spawn it at this location ([Codex] Psi) (page 21). ι After you successfully evade an enemy at Larval Tunnel: Draw the top card of the stack beneath this location. (Group limit once per round.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation – Put Crystal Nursery into play adjacent to the location from which it was drawn ([Codex] Phi) (page 21). ι After you end your turn in Crystal Nursery, take 1 direct horror: Draw the top card of the stack beneath Crystal Nursery. (Group limit once per round.)

For each point you fail by, choose a different option from the following, if able: — Take 1 damage. — Discard 1 card at random from your hand. — The nearest Insect enemy readies, moves (one location at a time) until it reaches your location, engages you, and makes an immediate attack.

Otherwise, perform the following: — Put each enemy at a Dark location and not engaged with an investigator into the pursuit area. — Shuffle each unrevealed Dark location along with the top 2 cards of the Woods deck and place them on top of the Woods deck. Flip each revealed empty Dark location to its unrevealed side, discarding all tokens. — Put locations from the top of the Woods deck into play above, below, to the left, and to the right of each location with an investigator. — The investigator with the Vale Lantern test ά (X), where X is the current darkness level. property.name: Text
property.value:
Enemies that ignore a token's effects do not trigger its Forced abilities.
Resource token Forced – When an enemy would move via a keyword and 1 or more barriers are between its location and the location it is moving to: Remove one of those barriers. Cancel the effects of the move.
Horror token Forced – When an enemy enters a location with a decoy: Remove a decoy. Deal 1 damage to that enemy, disengage it from each investigator, and exhaust it. That enemy cannot ready for the remainder of the round.
Damage token Forced – When an enemy enters a location with a trap: Remove the trap. Deal 2 damage to that enemy.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each investigator loses all of their clues. Check the Campaign Log and proceed to Scenario Interlude: Fate of the Vale (page 64). The investigators must decide their course of action (choose one): — "Let's end this." (You may only choose this option if Dr. Marquez has a hunch and Dr. Marquez has a plan. You may also choose this option if Gideon finished the tale of the Annabelle Lee.) Proceed to Fate of the Vale 1. — "Save the Vale!" (You may only choose this option if The Hemlock Family made a truce and/or The Peters family was reuinited.) Proceed to Fate of the Vale 2. — "Burn it all." (You may only choose this option if The Vale is full of fireworks.) Proceed to Fate of the Vale 3. — "Escape with our lives." Proceed to Fate of the Vale 4.
